title: Network errors! (Not being able to (re-)connect to the game properly)
body:
Whenever the champ select is over and you *should* connect to the game, the game just gives me a ''Network error'' saying i should check my connection even though im properly connected with the internet and everything works fine. Then after killing league 2-3 times via task manager i manage to connect waaay too late into the game (from minute 1 - 4) 
Im not sure when this started but probably since ive been using the new client, as i said..not sure though. 

Does anyone have a solution to this? It doesent happen every game but it still annoy's me alot, especially in ranked. 


PS: it would be nice to know that im not alone with this problem

replies.body: You can still run into issues reaching specific servers even if your internet is good,  For your specific issue, it sounds like your network is having problems transitioning from champion select to the game server.  I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this towards a fix.  Let me know if you have any questions on it.
